original_text: And on the following day they entered Caesarea. Cornelius was expecting them and had called together his relatives and close friends.
korean_text: 이튿날 가이사랴에 들어가니 고넬료가 그의 친척과 가까운 친구들을 모아 기다리더니

sentences.original_text: And on the following day they entered Caesarea.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 다음 날 그들이 가이사랴에 들어갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: and had called together his relatives and close friends.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 친척과 친한 친구들을 모아 불렀습니다.
